title: mindmastering
author: mindmastering
content: Helix is an AMM decentralized exchange, initially deployed on Ethereum, and now connecting users with BNB smart chain, OKC, and the RSK layer 2; servicing the Bitcoin network.Since launch, the platform has enabled low cost token swaps, with trading fees of 0.1%, governance, and access to passive earning opportunities, such as farms, pools, and fixed-term vaults. In addition to this, we have developed Nexus, a cross-chain NFT bridge, allowing for fast and efficient transfers from Solana to Ethereum, enabling NFT staking on the platform.Prior to deployment, Helix completed a successful audit through our partners at Extropy, and we will continue to work closely with experts in the field to ensure security of user funds. In line with these aims, we have on-boarded the founder of Extropy as one of our 7 project advisors.The final audit for Helix AMM can be found herehttps://security.extropy.io/static/media/HelixFinal.ec539013.pdfHELIX governance token presaleAs the native asset for the Helix AMM, and Geometry ecosystem, the HELIX governance token provides access to the wide range of features on the platform, including voting, liquidity provision, and other yield generating activities.As we continue development and move into the next phase of the Geometry roadmap, we’re offering potential users the opportunity to get preferable rates in the upcoming public presale, hosted on Pinksale FinanceTime & Date: 31st August 12:00 UTC – 4th September 20:00 UTCPresale Allocation: 3,000,000 HELIXPresale token price: $0.02Presale URL: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0xfcDc9862233D01599150af23e460DF2d6f810261?chain=BSC HELIX BNB Chain CA: 0xFd9B1448A8874b03e6E8476049dB259A82569a41✅ Live AMM - Live token price greatly exceeding IDO presale price✅ Staking Pools - Single asset pools with massive rewards and no lockup period. Deposit & earn a passive income✅ HELIX Vaults - Earn even more passive income from your assets with compoundable fixed-term single asset staking vaults!✅ HELIX Farms - Maximize the returns on your provided liquidity with high-yield HELIX farms✅ Governance voting - HELIX tokens also allow for participation in governance activities on the AMM. The more you hold, the louder your voice✅ Fully Audited & Secure - HELIX is fully audited by our partners over at Extropy. With the CEO of Extropy sitting on our board of advisors.Information on the HELIX Tokenomics can be found here:https://medium.com/geometryfinance/helix-tokenomics-documentation-b5051aaf80b1You can find more info about Helix AMM, the HELIX governance token, and the Geometry ecosystem below:Geometry Home: https://geometry.fi/Helix AMM: https://helix.finance/Helix Docs: https://geometry.gitbook.io/helix/Geometry Medium: https://medium.com/geometryfinanceHelix Medium: https://medium.com/helixgeometryTwitter: https://twitter.com/GeometryFinanceCommunity Discord: https://discord.gg/X5AP28zKpyTelegram: https://t.me/geometryfinanceJoin us!
